record.field: Hello! How can I help you?
Message that is sent to a user on first bot usage
The message has sent in telegram:
When Odoo Bot reports on successfully sent telegram message

def handle_webhook(httprequest): data = json.loads(httprequest.data.decode("utf-8")) log("Raw data: %s" % data, LOG_DEBUG)
update = telegram.parse_data(data) message = update.message or update.edited_message is_edit = bool(update.edited_message) contact_name = "%s@telegram" % message.from_user.id lead = env["crm.lead"].search([("contact_name", "=", contact_name)]) log("Lead data: %s" % lead, LOG_INFO)
if not lead: name = "%s%s" % (params.PARTNER_NAME_PREFIX, user2name(message.from_user)) lead = env["crm.lead"].create({"name": name, 'contact_name': contact_name})
odoo_message_text = "From Telegram:"
if message.text == "/start": telegram.sendMessage(message.chat.id, params.TELEGRAM_WELCOME_MESSAGE) log("User started a bot: %s" , LOG_INFO) elif is_edit: odoo_message_text = "Contact has edited the message:"
odoo_message_text = "%s\n\n%s" % (odoo_message_text, message.text)
lead.message_post(body=odoo_message_text)
